display.title: Fight for your Life
description: Overcoming the &&cGuardian of Gaia&&r requires taking every opportunity to tip the odds heavily in your favour - &&3Elementium Armor&&r, a &&3Terra Sword&&r, potent &&3Incense&&r, and &&das many trinkets as you can cram on&&r.
The &&3Spirits&&r rewarded can be used to &&denhance many an apparatus&&r - and create all new things, too.
